text: Les Terres-de-Chaux () is a commune in the Doubs department in Bourgogne- Franche-Comt√© in eastern France. ==Geography== The commune is northeast of Saint-Hippolyte. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Terres-de-Chaux on the regional web site * Category:Communes in Doubs
